code: @Override protected void doStart() throws Exception {     super.doStart().     log.debug("Connecting receiver: {} to the cluster: {}.", receiver, clusterName).     channel.setReceiver(receiver).     endpoint.connect(). }

@Override protected void doStop() throws Exception {     log.debug("Closing connection to cluster: {} from receiver: {}.", clusterName, receiver).     channel.setReceiver(null).     endpoint.disconnect().     super.doStop(). }
